L3 II Freedom Settings Hello world! Use at your own risk! Install CWM Recovery Restore Stock Recovery Reboot to Recovery SD Card Data Hack CWM Recovery by PlayfulGod CWM Installer This will void your warranty, and you will need to be rooted.string> Using the button combo to boot to recovery will WIPE DATA!!!
 So be sure to have made a backup!!!

 All other boot methods seem to work fine. INSTALL CWM Restore To Stock SD Card Hacks Restore to Stock This will restore the Stock LG recovery THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND NOT WORKING YET SD Card Formatter Change the Data Partition Restore the Original Data Partition Dev Info Developer Info Formatter THIS WILL FORMAT YOUR SDCARD. ONLY PROCEED IF YOU ARE READY FOR THAT 4 gig Data Partition 2 gig Data Partition 1 gig Data Partition SplashScreen Attempt to Get Root Get Root This will try to root your f3. It may or may not work. If it doesn't, just use saferoot from a pc. Attempt To Root SDhacksErrorActivity I detected that your SD Card is already formatted or that Links2SD is already in place. This hack is not compatible with that. Factory Reset and delete any other partitions. Format the Second Partition Click ME Pressy4pie, PlayfulGod.

 CWM ported by: Pressy4pie.

 SDCardHack implemented by: PressY4pie.

 Root method by: k1mu.
